summary: This is an email from December 17, 2007, discussing a Catch-22 situation where an agent is the subject of an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) investigation for failing to properly confer with victims. The sender is asking what they or the agents should be doing.

events.title: OPR Investigation into Agent
events.description: An agent is the subject of an Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) investigation for failing to properly confer with victims.

keyFacts: An agent is under OPR investigation for failing to properly confer with victims.
The situation is described as a 'Catch-22'.
The email asks for guidance on what the sender or agents should be doing.
